name: Initial D Arcade Stage Ver. 3 Cycraft Edition
overview:
Initial D Arcade Stage Ver. 3, known as Initial D Arcade Stage Ver. 3 (頭文字 D ARCADE STAGE Ver.3) in Japan, is an arcade sequel to Initial D: Arcade Stage Ver. 2.

A special version of this game was released for the Cycraft arcade cabinet titled Initial D: Version 3 Cycraft. The Cycraft is a special arcade cabinet developed by Simuline and Sega and released in 2003. The cabinet is a motion simulator which offers a greater degree of movement than a standard sit-down cabinet. These cabinets can be linked together for competitive multiplayer gameplay.
